definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Yibin prefecture level city in Sichuan
to welcome a guest/to entertain a customer (of prostitute)
Yibin prefecture level city in Sichuan

sentences.english: I'm your Aunt Monica. Yes, I am.
sentences.chinese: 賓，我是你姑姑摩妮卡，沒錯。

sentences.english: Most states are Jacobin in spirit.
sentences.chinese: 大多數國家在精神上都是雅各賓。

sentences.english: Binxing is a kind of etiquette for commending and learning encouragement, which is origin from "Zhou".
sentences.chinese: 賓興起源於《周禮》，是一種表彰和勸學的禮儀。

sentences.english: Then Caspian decided to risk everything on one stroke.
sentences.chinese: 於是凱斯賓決定孤注一擲。

sentences.english: Late in life he became chief cook at a restaurant in Corbin.
sentences.chinese: 晚年，他成了科爾賓一家餐館的主廚。
在哈爾賓今天是下雪的。

sentences.english: The four Pevensie children meet Prince Caspian.
sentences.chinese: 帕文西四兄妹與凱斯賓王子會合。

sentences.english: He laughed accordingly at the idea of Mr. Arabin 's modesty.
sentences.chinese: 他想到阿拉賓先生的謙虛謹慎，就覺得好笑。

sentences.english: There are 9 team roles that Belbin has identified.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾賓指出了9中團隊角色。

sentences.english: Trufflehunter is one of the key animal roles in Prince Caspian.
sentences.chinese: 特魯佛汗特是凱斯賓王子裏的關鍵動物之一。

sentences.english: Mr Bing supports this. But executing it will be difficult.
sentences.chinese: 賓先生同意這種觀點，但執行起來相當困難。

sentences.english: Mr Bing was standing outside his fish store.
sentences.chinese: 賓先生站在他的魚店外面。

sentences.english: Tobin proposed taxing financial transactions to slow the flow of money to and from markets.
sentences.chinese: 託賓建議對金融交易徵稅以減緩市場上的資金流動。

sentences.english: Bin Laden then set up terrorist training camps in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 接着賓拉登在阿富汗境內設立起恐怖份子的訓練營。

definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
